name: Gangster's Paradise
description:
Follow the story of Harold and Fiona while they adventure together to avenge Harold's past. This is a swift 1 hour-ish story. 

The game tries to delve deep into character development and interesting dialogue with epic music.

If you like adventures and fighting bosses with a turn based fighting style you will enjoy this game.

The game is kinda slow paced but it gets faster towards the end.

This game is FREE for anybody to download, please share the link from this page.

Thanks!

-JDgoldvox

If you get stuck on any part of the game please feel free to email me! I'll try to respond as soon as possible: VoxcastJDgoldvox@gmail.com

This game is the first game I've made. Feel free to express your opinions on how bad it is :) - I really don't mind. I want to recieve negative feedback!
